ðŸ“– Summary: ItsCaptchaBot is a Telegram bot that adds a captcha verification step for new chat participants. It helps to prevent spam and bots from entering the chat by requiring users to solve a captcha within 10 minutes. The bot supports multiple languages and can be easily installed and configured.
